name: Mesimpos
description:
Welcome to the world of MESIMPOS  Mesimpos is a little puzzle-filled exploration game. 

There are 3 DIFFERENT ENDINGS including 2 SECRET ONES ! 

Synopsis:

An ancient evil magic reigns in many places. You play as a witch sent to a cave populated by fairies and zombies. The mayor of the village has a contract to offer us, but it looks like he's hiding things... Darker things may lurk in this cave. Let's discover the secrets of mesimpos and unmask the puppeteer! 

Group school project carried out in less than 5 days : 

Lecocq Raphaël (programming/enigma/narrative) 

Airiaud Baptiste (sculpt fairies/ zombies and texturing) 

Le blanc Amelie (assets) 

Autissier Julien (assets and hud) 

Chartier Christian (assets and hud) 

Oubry Hadrien (assets) 

Boga Lauryn (assets) 

Bayet Margaux (assets) 

Rodrigues Leitao Diogo (assets and easter eggs)  Diogo Itch.io

Liang Cindy (assets sound and hud)

Dialogue IN FRENCH ONLY for now.

Blueprint programming in UE4
